stories.Title: Take us to the moon
stories.Description: The moon race is on for next year as commercial companies prepare to boost lunar exploration. Astrobotic is one of them, aiming to launch its Peregrine lander on January 8 aboard a ULA rocket.
stories.Tweet: Take us to the moon 📦 The moon race is on for next year as commercial companies prepare to boost lunar exploration. Astrobotic is one of them, aiming to launch its Peregrine lander on January 8 aboard a ULA rocket. #rocketscience https://techcrunch.com/2023/12/19/astrobotic-ready-to-launch-peregrine-lunar-lander-in-early-january/

stories.Title: The fall of NEOWISE
stories.Description: NASA's infrared telescope NEOWISE is set to face challenges similar to those of Icarus, as increased solar activity disrupts its orbit, leading to its eventual descent into Earth's atmosphere in 2025.
stories.Tweet: The fall of NEOWISE 📦 NASA's infrared telescope NEOWISE is set to face challenges similar to those of Icarus, as increased solar activity disrupts its orbit, leading to its eventual descent into Earth's atmosphere in 2025. #NASA https://gizmodo.com/neowise-asteroid-hunting-satellite-demise-sun-solar-1851110923

stories.Title: Let’s go Ariane 6!
stories.Description: The European Space Agency remains confident about Ariane 6's schedule. Recent tests have been successful, and despite some minor setbacks, the launch date for mid-2024 is still on track.
stories.Tweet: Let’s go Ariane 6! 📦 The European Space Agency remains confident about Ariane 6's schedule. Recent tests have been successful, and despite some minor setbacks, the launch date for mid-2024 is still on track. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/ariane-6-schedule-not-affected-by-aborted-upper-stage-test/

stories.Title: Step by step
stories.Description: Showcasing the powerful bond between humanoid robots and artificial intelligence, researchers at UC Berkeley are harnessing reinforcement learning to teach a bot the intricate art of walking.
stories.Tweet: Step by step 📦 Showcasing the powerful bond between humanoid robots and artificial intelligence, researchers at UC Berkeley are harnessing reinforcement learning to teach a bot the intricate art of walking. #science https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/humanoid-taught-itself-to-walk

stories.Title: Floating around
stories.Description: NASA is gearing up for an exciting mission, reaching new heights literally. The GUSTO experiment will soar on a balloon over Antarctica to collect data for a 3D map of our Milky Way.
stories.Tweet: Floating around 📦 NASA is gearing up for an exciting mission, reaching new heights literally. The GUSTO experiment will soar on a balloon over Antarctica to collect data for a 3D map of our Milky Way. #science https://www.theverge.com/2023/12/18/24006983/nasa-gusto-balloon-telescope-mission-milky-way-map

stories.Title: Some legal boundaries
stories.Description: As artificial intelligence advances, new regulations are emerging to guide its use. The UK Supreme Court has ruled that AI cannot be listed as an inventor on patents.
stories.Tweet: Some legal boundaries 📦 As artificial intelligence advances, new regulations are emerging to guide its use. The UK Supreme Court has ruled that AI cannot be listed as an inventor on patents. #ai https://www.cnbc.com/2023/12/20/ai-cannot-be-named-as-an-inventor-top-uk-court-says-in-patent-dispute.html

stories.Title: AI vs. human art
stories.Description: A recent study suggests that while humans may struggle to distinguish AI-generated art from human creations, there is an unconscious preference for the latter, as it conveys more feelings and ideas.
stories.Tweet: AI vs. human art 📦 A recent study suggests that while humans may struggle to distinguish AI-generated art from human creations, there is an unconscious preference for the latter, as it conveys more feelings and ideas. #ai https://techxplore.com/news/2023-12-people-struggle-ai-human-art.html

stories.Title: Copilot gets musical
stories.Description: Microsoft has partnered with Suno, an AI-driven music platform, to grant new capabilities to Copilot. The latest feature allows users to easily compose personalized songs through text prompts.
stories.Tweet: Copilot gets musical 📦 Microsoft has partnered with Suno, an AI-driven music platform, to grant new capabilities to Copilot. The latest feature allows users to easily compose personalized songs through text prompts. #microsoft https://www.engadget.com/microsoft-copilot-can-now-make-cute-little-songs-on-demand-182305372.html

stories.Title: Help is on its way
stories.Description: Apple is enhancing its satellite feature for iPhone users in the US, offering seamless roadside assistance when cellular coverage is out. Just access via Messages and select your issue.
stories.Tweet: Help is on its way 📦 Apple is enhancing its satellite feature for iPhone users in the US, offering seamless roadside assistance when cellular coverage is out. Just access via Messages and select your issue.  #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/12/19/roadside-assistance-iphone-15/

stories.Title: Welcome to the club
stories.Description: The announcement everyone has been waiting for has finally happened, as Volkswagen, Audi, and Porsche have decided to join Tesla's NACS connector revolution, starting in 2025.
stories.Tweet: Welcome to the club 📦 The announcement everyone has been waiting for has finally happened, as Volkswagen, Audi, and Porsche have decided to join Tesla's NACS connector revolution, starting in 2025. #electricvehicles https://electrek.co/2023/12/19/vw-audi-porsche-finally-commit-to-nacs-connectors-in-2025/

title: NACS club expands, AI and art, Copilot's new tunes
description: Many of us were just waiting for the day when Volkswagen would finally get on board with Tesla's NACS connector, and guess what? It happened before Christmas! And not just them – Audi and Porsche are also involved. The whole AI art vs. human art debate is still going strong. People have all kinds of opinions, but the funny thing is, we humans don’t always spot the difference easily. Oh, and by the way, Microsoft dropped a cool new Copilot feature, and it's all about music!
